title: Gi
info: The Gi is an Armor item that can be equipped in the shirt slot. It provides 4 defense along with a 5% damage and critical hit boost to weapons. It also provides a 10% melee and movement speed increase. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 2. The Gi will visually cover up what is equipped in the Pants slot.
